ChapterShortDescription: An initiative by Goan tech enthusiasts to help build a strong tech community in the state.
ChapterLongDec: Dev Cluster is an initiative by a group of Goan tech enthusiasts to help build a strong tech community and ensure that knowledge directly reaches the Goan public with ease.
ChapterHistory: Dev Cluster is a seven-year-old community with its roots in the GTUG/GDG programme. We have since been successful in partnering with Facebook Developer Circles (DevC) Goa and Free Software Users Group (FSUG) Goa. We have creatively engaged both student developers and professionals through our masterclasses, study jams, hackathons and meetups.
